snippet: Jared Lee Loughner, who killed six people and shot former Arizona lawmaker Gabrielle Giffords in a 2011 rampage, kept bomb-making components in a safe in his bedroom, the Los Angeles Times reported on Friday....

headline.print_headline: FBI Found Bomb-Making Cache in Tucson Rampage Gunman's Home: LA Times
headline.main: FBI Found Bomb-Making Cache in Tucson Rampage Gunman's Home: LA Times

lead_paragraph: Jared Lee Loughner, who killed six people and shot former Arizona lawmaker Gabrielle Giffords in a 2011 rampage, kept bomb-making components in a safe in his bedroom, the Los Angeles Times reported on Friday.
